TopicTitle: i tried installing KSP interstellar and it broke my game

Articles.Content: i cant upload the image but basically it said it should be installed on gamedata/999_ksp-recall but its installed on gamedata/gamedata/999_ksp-recall i have verified my game files and uninstalled and reinstalled my game but its not working
You don’t want 2 levels of GameData folders or it will break. Drag the 999_ksp-recall into the top level GameData (where your other mods are listed) then get rid of that other one. That should do it.
